tool_description: Analyzes physical characteristics and technical evidence of an artwork to support or contradict attribution and dating claims made in provenance documentation.

analysis_type.description: Type of physical analysis performed (pigment, canvas, brushwork, signature, frame, etc.)

technical_analysis_results.description: Results from technical analysis (X-ray, UV, etc.)

condition_notes.description: Notes on the condition of the artwork

error_messages: Invalid analysis type: Analysis type must be one of [pigment, canvas, brushwork, signature, frame, underdrawing, dendrochronology, other].
Invalid date format: stated_creation_date must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
Missing required data: artwork_medium and stated_artist cannot be empty.
Insufficient technical data: At least one form of physical or technical evidence must be provided.
usage: Analyze physical evidence to verify or contradict claims made in provenance documentation. The tool compares physical characteristics against known standards for the stated artist and time period.

consistency_score.description: How well physical evidence matches stated provenance (0-100)

date_consistency.description: Whether physical evidence supports the stated date

attribution_consistency.description: Whether physical evidence supports the stated attribution
